name: Trapper Simulator
description:
Be stealth be silent setup the perfect traps!

You'll be able to set up the trap in the open wild world and find a different kind of animals than no other game has got.

- You'll be able to build your own designed traps and find used ones among the trees.
- Beware of dangerous animals which can attack you.
- Hide in your cosy place and expand it,
- Escape into the wild and find how to survive.
- Find how to create different hunting experience mainly with your skills and experience.

Work needs to be done to achieve success.
Explorer wild forests and prepare yourself to different approaches off hunting, without firearms.

Use your brain more than a weapon and catch prey.

Let's begin Hunting.
